section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter governs all persons licensed as social workers in the State and all persons, agencies, institutions, or organizations seeking to provide continuing education programs who submit applications to the Board for sponsorship authorization and program approval under the requirements of COMAR 10.42.06.

para.text: The following fees are established by the Board:
Reactivation processing fee to change from inactive status to active status:
Reinstatement processing fee to change from non-renewed status to active status:
Application for authorization to sponsor continuing education programs (required only if not automatically entitled to sponsor programs under COMAR 10.42.06):
Failure to notify the Board of change of address — $50;
The Board may not refund a fee.
The Maryland Health Care Commission may assess a fee for health care professionals which the applicant shall pay at the time of license renewal as specified in COMAR 10.25.02.
Fees are subject to change by action of the State Board of Social Work Examiners.
The Board shall give notice of a change in fees to licensees and applicants by any reasonable means.

section.heading: Maryland Health Care Commission Assessment for Health Care Practitioners.
section.text: At the time of license renewal of a certified social worker—clinical, certified social worker, and a graduate social worker, an applicant shall pay to the Board a user fee assessed by the Maryland Health Care Commission, as specified annually in the Maryland Register pursuant to COMAR 10.25.02.
